name: Notorious
tag_list: fashion, advice, mobile, curated, personal-shopper, shopping, stylist, styler, fashion-influencer, boutiques
description: A personal shopper in your pocket.
overview:
Notorious brings the personal shopper experience to users’ pockets, through a marketplace where they can ask their favorite bloggers, “it girls” and other fashion influencers for personal styling guidance in real time.

Notorious is a simple yet effective app that allows anyone to discover great new looks, new fashion influencers to follow, or, simply, to make better -to the point- shopping decisions, saving time and money in the process.
